textfield:
thats an environment to introduce snap@

click or scroll in the grid..
presets from all acts will be recalled.

move the ramp-slider on top of snap@1
to get a smooth transition between the presets.


click on the second preset here in notepad@1

kaos@ can random click in a defined area (frame)

the frame in kaos@1 is set to snap@1's preset-field.

if you activate the "random mouse click" this will take control over your mouse !

use the space-key (blank) to stop it !!

another note here...

using random@ instead of kaos@ is more convenient.

it keeps the mouse under your control.

click on "1" in the buttom line of random@1 to activate randomizing snap@1 presets.
